DOC.brief_summary: RATIONALE : Drugs use chemotherapy use different way stop tumor cell divide stop grow die . PURPOSE : Phase II trial compare effectiveness docetaxel treat Caucasian African American patient solid tumor .
DOC.brief_title: Docetaxel Treating Patients With Solid Tumors
DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : - Compare population pharmacokinetics docetaxel Caucasians African American patient solid tumor . - Compare pharmacodynamic effect single dose docetaxel relation hematological toxicity patient population . - Determine CYP3A4 genotype P-glycoprotein ( P-gp ) expression relationship docetaxel clearance patient population . OUTLINE : Patients receive docetaxel IV 1 hour day 1 . Patients may receive additional course begin 21 day first docetaxel dose discretion physician .
DOC.criteria: DISEASE CHARACTERISTICS : Histologically proven unresectable solid tumor ( e.g. , lung , breast , head neck , bladder ) Clinically suitable treatment single agent docetaxel Caucasian ( least 2 generation originate original people Europe , North Africa , Middle East ) OR African American ( least 2 generation originate black racial group Africa ) PATIENT CHARACTERISTICS : Age : 18 Performance status : 02 Hematopoietic : Granulocyte count least 1,500/mm3 Platelet count least 100,000/mm3 Hepatic : Bilirubin great upper limit normal ( ULN ) AST great 1.5 time ULN AND Alkaline phosphatase great 2.5 time ULN Renal : BUN great 1.5 time ULN Creatinine great 1.5 time ULN Other : Not pregnant nursing Fertile patient must use effective contraception PRIOR CONCURRENT THERAPY : Biologic therapy : No prior bone marrow transplantation Chemotherapy : No prior docetaxel Prior paclitaxel allow 1 2 prior chemotherapy regimens allow At least 4 week since prior chemotherapy ( 6 week nitrosoureas mitomycin ) No concurrent chemotherapy Endocrine therapy : No concurrent hormone disease related condition Concurrent steroid adrenal failure allow Radiotherapy : At least 2 week since prior radiotherapy Palliative radiotherapy allow except whole brain irradiation CNS disease Surgery : Not specify Other : At least 48 hour since prior concurrent ethanol ( CYP3A enzyme inducer ) grapefruit juice ( CYP3A enzyme inhibitor ) At least 7 day since prior concurrent CYP450 induce drug : Antiseizure medication : phenobarbital , phenytoin , carbamazepine , lamotrigine AntiTB therapy : rifampin , isoniazid , sulfinpyrazone At least 7 day since prior concurrent CYP450 3A inhibit drug : Macrolides : erythromycin , clarithromycin , azithromycin , roxithromycin Azoles : ketoconazole , fluconazole , itraconazole Other antibiotic : metronidazole chloramphenicol AntiHIV drug : ritonavir , indinavir , nelfinavir , delavirdine Immunosuppressive agent : cyclosporine Antidepressant agent : nefazodone
